en.modal_alert_banner: This component is ufec.ModalAlert. This page's source code:
en.sure_create_user: Are you sure to create a random user?
en.sure_delete_user: Are you sure to delete an user?
en.sure_delete_user_tip: After user deletion, can not restore. Please be careful.
